generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalks, extending across the frame.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian sidewalks are visible along both sides of the road, separated by curbs and marked with pedestrian crossings.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring various architectural styles and windows.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalk and street, providing greenery.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing clear and bright.
- person: A person is standing on the sidewalk near the traffic light on the right side of the image.
- rider: Two cyclists are visible riding on the road, one closer to the center and another slightly ahead.
- car: Several cars are parked along the side of the road, and a few are driving on the road.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersections, controlling the flow of traffic.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are present, including yield signs and directional signs.
- pole: Traffic light poles and sign poles are visible throughout the scene.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked along the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
